document.full_text: three times in recent days, as yemen slips into bloody conflict, president ali abdullah saleh has promised to agree to a transfer of power, only to back out at the last minute.
document.title: evasions by leader add chaos in yemen
lines_and_colors: three times in recent days, as yemen slips into bloody conflict, president ali abdullah saleh has promised to agree to a transfer of power, only to back out at the last minute.
